name: Razor
pages: Razor is an enchantment for standard Sharp Weapons or LimaTech equipment. This enchantment allows a qualifying mob (or player) to drop their head when killed, at a 10% chance per level. Starting at $(o)Level 5$(), Razor can decapitate the Ender Dragon.

Level 3 is the maximum level obtainable through the standard enchantment table. Higher levels must be obtained via Equipment Upgrades or another source of enchantments capable of going above the standard max levels.
